North Korean leader Kim Jong-un will visit Russia this month to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin. The leaders of the two countries will discuss the supply of weapons from North Korea to Russia in connection with the Russia-Ukraine war.

North Korean leader Kim Jong-un will visit Russia this month to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin. The leaders of the two countries will discuss the supply of weapons from North Korea to Russia in connection with the Russia-Ukraine war.
